title: XGBoost in Machine Learning
description: XGBoost or Gradient Boosting is a machine learning algorithm that goes through cycles to iteratively add models to a set. In this article, I will take you through the XGBoost algorithm in Machine Learning.The cycle of the XGBoost algorithm begins by initializing the whole with a unique model, the predictions of which can be quite naive.Also, Read – Overfitting and Underfitting in Machine Learning.The Process of XGBoost Algorithm:
